title: Cutting-edge AI was supposed to get cheaper. It’s more expensive than ever.

content:

title: Knockverse Unveils WTMF: The AI-Powered Digital Companion
description: Knockverse Pvt Ltd has launched a beta version of its AI app, WTMF, aiming to blend artificial intelligence with personal productivity and emotional well-being tools. Designed to act as a digital companion, WTMF offers features like journaling, mood tracking, and conversational interactions to enhance mental well-being.
